businessProfile.name: Big Guys Pizza
businessProfile.address: 435 Bower Hill Rd, Bridgeville, PA 15017, USA
businessProfile.formatted_address: 435 Bower Hill Rd, Bridgeville, PA 15017, USA

reviews.text: I moved to South Fayette  two years ago‚Ä¶Big guys Pizza was the first place I ordered from and it‚Äôs the only place I ordered from ü§óü§óI have tried the hoagies the pizza the salads everything there is delicious. Of Course, I recommend them if you are over this way stop by and try them. You won‚Äôt be disappointed. They also have a lottery that they do every month my son and I won a free large pizzaü§ó

Really solid pizza overall.  Extra sauce was asked for and delivered!  Haven't been here in awhile, but grabbed the Valentine's Day Special and we're very pleasantly surprised!

Meatballs are very, very solid, and appear homemade!

Definitely interested in coming back soon to see if the food passes the second go around test.  (I think it easily will!)

Best pizza around. And you‚Äôre crazy if you don‚Äôt try one of their big slaws or the ‚Äúdang good‚Äù hoagies. Family owned, great people, and most of all they really take pride in their customers. I don‚Äôt even know what that sauce was but it was unbelievable.
Incredibly friendly, brought us a tray of fries on the house while we waited for our pizza. Would highly recommend.

Got a medium cheese pizza, requested it baked well, and they got it perfect. Great balance of sauce cheese and crust. Price felt a bit steep for the size of the medium, but not really problematic. Will be glad to pickup here again

recentReviews.text: Big Guys Pizza is DELICIOUS!  I have ordered several times from here and I have never been disappointed. Staff is very friendly! Five stars for me!!!
I won't a large cheese pizza in their lottery and it was Great, great, great!!!!!

I moved to South Fayette  two years ago‚Ä¶Big guys Pizza was the first place I ordered from and it‚Äôs the only place I ordered from ü§óü§óI have tried the hoagies the pizza the salads everything there is delicious. Of Course, I recommend them if you are over this way stop by and try them. You won‚Äôt be disappointed. They also have a lottery that they do every month my son and I won a free large pizzaü§ó
Picked up lunch for 3 of us. Great food. And plenty for the price.
If you live in Bridgeville and you're getting pizza from anywhere other than Big Guys, you're living life wrong.
Incredibly friendly, brought us a tray of fries on the house while we waited for our pizza. Would highly recommend.
This place has good pizza and good people my mom left her purse there and they called and when we came to pick it up all the items were there INCLUDING A 50 DOLLAR BILL these people are truly kind.

detailedReviews.author: Nancy Davies
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza and hoagies!

detailedReviews.author: laurieann callahan
detailedReviews.text: Big Guys Pizza is DELICIOUS!  I have ordered several times from here and I have never been disappointed. Staff is very friendly! Five stars for me!!!

detailedReviews.author: Katherine Woznek
detailedReviews.text: I won't a large cheese pizza in their lottery and it was Great, great, great!!!!!

detailedReviews.author: Timothy Dixon
detailedReviews.text: Very friendly.

detailedReviews.author: Tearra
detailedReviews.text: I moved to South Fayette  two years ago‚Ä¶Big guys Pizza was the first place I ordered from and it‚Äôs the only place I ordered from ü§óü§óI have tried the hoagies the pizza the salads everything there is delicious. Of Course, I recommend them if you are over this way stop by and try them. You won‚Äôt be disappointed. They also have a lottery that they do every month my son and I won a free large pizzaü§ó

detailedReviews.author: Matthew Schellhaas
detailedReviews.text: Picked up lunch for 3 of us. Great food. And plenty for the price.

detailedReviews.author: Josh Thomas
detailedReviews.text: If you live in Bridgeville and you're getting pizza from anywhere other than Big Guys, you're living life wrong.

detailedReviews.author: Thomas Wicker
detailedReviews.text: Incredibly friendly, brought us a tray of fries on the house while we waited for our pizza. Would highly recommend.

detailedReviews.author: Laurel Cavalier
detailedReviews.text: This place has good pizza and good people my mom left her purse there and they called and when we came to pick it up all the items were there INCLUDING A 50 DOLLAR BILL these people are truly kind.

detailedReviews.author: Brian Parrish
detailedReviews.text: Really fantastic Pizza and their Hoagies are great too. I know that they make their dough fresh every day and you can tell when you take your first bite.

detailedReviews.author: Jason Makel
detailedReviews.text: We tried out multiple items and can vouch that the pepperoni rolls, wings, and especially the lasagna pizza were excellent!!  H2P!

detailedReviews.author: Ken Debaker
detailedReviews.text: Food is always good and on time if you‚Äôre hungry you should just call

detailedReviews.author: Brannan Schoonover
detailedReviews.text: Excellent food and service as usual

detailedReviews.author: Justin Blake
detailedReviews.text: Great food and service! The owner is a great dude who supports his community too.

detailedReviews.author: Amy Evans
detailedReviews.text: Big Guys is the back up chef I always need. We have yet to find a food that we don't like. They are consistently delicious! The staff is always friendly. Our delivery drivers often get greeted by our kids and they are always patient and kind. Whether you're a stressed out mom looking for a break or just passing by, Big Guys is the best!

detailedReviews.author: Scott Christian
detailedReviews.text: Wonderful place, Ryan the manager is extremely accommodating and attentive to customer needs. Food is good and consistant quality. Give them a try, it's well worth it.

detailedReviews.author: gwennythepooh
detailedReviews.text: The food is always great and the staff goes above and beyond!

detailedReviews.author: Paul Meyer
detailedReviews.text: The delivery guy today was super. He even helped me find a package that was delivered to me that was placed in the totally wrong place. Talk about wonderful! üëçüëç

detailedReviews.author: Bill Mitchell
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza.  Great garlic knots

detailedReviews.author: Anthony DiPaolo
detailedReviews.text: It‚Äôs a pretty decent spot for pizza and sandwiches. They use really good cheese and the dough seems fresh and homemade. I love the cheesesteaks, love the fries. I‚Äôve been ordering here for years. I‚Äôll admit I stopped getting the breadsticks/dough knots because they were consistently undercooked. It hasn‚Äôt turned me away though.

detailedReviews.author: M
detailedReviews.text: Love this place!  The gluten free pizza is awesome!!! no wrong choices on this menu 10/10

detailedReviews.author: jaelyn riel
detailedReviews.text: amazing food quality and service!

detailedReviews.author: Caleb Capicotto
detailedReviews.text: Amazing pizza

detailedReviews.author: Glenn Smith
detailedReviews.text: Sub par I'm my own personal opinion  the Crust was flat and hard to chew ,very few pepperoni and mushrooms on my pizza and just not worth the 22.00 I spent .

detailedReviews.author: Beth Frederick
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza! Was looking for somewhere close to feed a crowd of  12. Pepperoni pizza was excellent, and the order was ready within 20 minutes. Would definitely order from here again.

detailedReviews.author: Janie Carr
detailedReviews.text: Food was delicious. Miss the long haired kid with glasses, he really used to make me smile.

detailedReviews.author: Jerome Smith
detailedReviews.text: Great food.. always hot..friendly service

detailedReviews.author: Jack4nd1
detailedReviews.text: Excellent personal Sicilian pizza!  Light and fluffy crust and it only took 7 minutes!  Recommend!

detailedReviews.author: giavanna minella
detailedReviews.text: payton was so polite and helpful

detailedReviews.author: Camp Aim
detailedReviews.text: Big Guys catered our end of season bowling banquet last night and did a fantastic job. All of the food was excellent! I wish I would have taken pictures, but the guys tore up the food, and the amount of food that we got for the price was amazing! I would highly recommend Big Guys to cater any casual event.

detailedReviews.author: Dylan Small
detailedReviews.text:
BEST Pizza in the area.
I used to live in New Jersey, so I have learned to be a bit of a pizza  snob, Big Guys Pizza is the best in the area by far and will be ordering again soon

10/10!

detailedReviews.author: Raymond Jester
detailedReviews.text: The people that work there they don‚Äôt know the menu and they charge me $12 and some cents when I only wanted four slices of the Sicilian, which is a special and I know I‚Äôve got it for like 78 bucks now they‚Äôre charging me $12 $13 I get it for once in a blue moon. I am not paying that. I‚Äôll never pay that because he‚Äôs never know what the hell you End were doing over there so I will stop buying from you. I‚Äôll just go somewhere else. Thank you you have a great day.

detailedReviews.author: Ashley Dodd
detailedReviews.text: Their app is easy to use. Their food is always so good.

detailedReviews.author: Chris Belasco
detailedReviews.text: Excellent food, excellent service. Thanks guys!!

detailedReviews.author: Deb
detailedReviews.text: Best Pizza. We are visiting from Lancaster we drive around an hour to find this great Pizza shop!!!!

detailedReviews.author: Hero Mobile Detailing
detailedReviews.text: Awesome

detailedReviews.author: Chris Tavoletti
detailedReviews.text: I love there rolls and my favorite has got to be Buffalo chicken roll. Great service and even better food!

detailedReviews.author: Kristi Lang
detailedReviews.text: Big Guys is our absolute favorite place to order pizza from. We love their classic pepperoni as our go-to, especially The Big Guy for parties! But their buffalo pizza is our favorite pie they make! It‚Äôs just a tad spicy so it‚Äôs pretty universally loved at our home. They are always fast, have never messed up an order even once, and if you use their app you almost always have some kind of coupon you can use! Their pizza is definitely worth the price and their cheap delivery makes it a great busy-night option (though it tends to be our weekend movie-watching dinner treat). My mom said their steak salad is the best steak salad she‚Äôs ever had - and she‚Äôs picky so that‚Äôs saying a lot! We‚Äôve also ordered some of their appetizers for parties and they‚Äôre always gone very quickly! Everyone always asks where we ordered from when they taste the pizza, so it‚Äôs definitely a crowd pleaser or perfect for two on a Netflix date at home. Order here and I promise you‚Äôll be impressed!

detailedReviews.author: Austin Habbyshaw
detailedReviews.text: Honestly the best and most consistent pizza shop around. Tons of variety and super friendly faces! I can‚Äôt recommend it enough to friends and family:)

detailedReviews.author: Mason Kusky
detailedReviews.text: Absolutely kind-hearted and amazing people, had the food ready 15 minutes early, and walked it out to my car for me, but not appreciate them more and cannot wait to do more business the food was amazing as always

detailedReviews.author: Mike Reddy
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza in town. Consistent and great quality! The guys are willing to accommodate your requests also!! Awesome place!

detailedReviews.author: nathan shields
detailedReviews.text: Adequate service and food was done on time. That's the only good thing about the place. The food ingredients are all basically Sam's Club specials. Not worth the price. They couldn't even use actual strip bacon and instead dumped bacon bits on the sandwich. $5 food for $20 price just isn't worth it.

detailedReviews.author: Adam Seewald
detailedReviews.text: I ordered pizza for my girls basketball team in Upper saint clair ...food was excellent and the service was impressive...they delivered with plates and napkins so we could eat at the court .I will be ordering again

detailedReviews.author: Richard Wethli
detailedReviews.text: Best pie I‚Äôve had in a long time! 1/2 steak hoagie sealed the deal

detailedReviews.author: Steve Lower
detailedReviews.text: Top of the line always quality food and friendly.

detailedReviews.author: Boss Ewing
detailedReviews.text:
Pizza  4/10
Subs 1/10

detailedReviews.author: Wes Wyzykowski
detailedReviews.text:
Really solid pizza overall.  Extra sauce was asked for and delivered!  Haven't been here in awhile, but grabbed the Valentine's Day Special and we're very pleasantly surprised!

Meatballs are very, very solid, and appear homemade!

Definitely interested in coming back soon to see if the food passes the second go around test.  (I think it easily will!)

detailedReviews.author: Brett T
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza around. And you‚Äôre crazy if you don‚Äôt try one of their big slaws or the ‚Äúdang good‚Äù hoagies. Family owned, great people, and most of all they really take pride in their customers. I don‚Äôt even know what that sauce was but it was unbelievable.

detailedReviews.author: Paige Devlin
detailedReviews.text: I could live on the ranch dressing and the garlic knots alone, but the pizza is pretty bomb, too.

detailedReviews.author: Aaron Rosier
detailedReviews.text: Got a medium cheese pizza, requested it baked well, and they got it perfect. Great balance of sauce cheese and crust. Price felt a bit steep for the size of the medium, but not really problematic. Will be glad to pickup here again

detailedReviews.author: Brandon Love
detailedReviews.text: Nothing but great customer service and even better food. Every time i order. When you do get a chance to see Brian it‚Äôs always good conversation.

detailedReviews.author: Letitia Minnetti
detailedReviews.text:
We only recently started going here and can‚Äôt say enough great things ! The staff is always pleasant and smiling ! We got the big red square pizza for the first time and it was delicious!! The wings were really good too ( and my husband is a wing connoisseur lol )
Will definitely be going back !!

detailedReviews.author: Amy Pinsky
detailedReviews.text: I highly recommend Big Guys!   I order lunch for my corporate office every Friday.   The food is always ready on time, and it‚Äôs a pleasure to deal with their team.   The prices are reasonable, and the food is consistently delicious and hot! A fantastic choice!!

detailedReviews.author: Crystal Z
detailedReviews.text: I have never had such bomb pizza before! That crust is everything! Shout out to the worker James. Any crazy pizza I want he helps come to life. Highly recommend! Food and staff here are golden. It‚Äôs rare today.

detailedReviews.author: Paul Jarnagin
detailedReviews.text: Great experience ordering and eating a delectible pizza. Will be ordering from Big Guy's again!

detailedReviews.author: Javon Hines
detailedReviews.text:
Best pizza around. Always my go to for pizza. Great service and foods always fresh.
Thanks for supporting chartiers valley boys basketball as well.

detailedReviews.author: John Russell
detailedReviews.text: Good pizza. Great bread sticks

detailedReviews.author: Corey Dotchin
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza,  the service was quick and ready!! One of the best in the area

detailedReviews.author: Jay Verzich
detailedReviews.text:
Best pizza in the Bridgeville  area. The owner is also a great guy. Big guys pizza is hands down the best around. Always great service and helpful.
We also appreciate  the support  for the chartiers valley boys basketball üèÄ program.
Thank you for always being willing to help the team.

detailedReviews.author: Susan McHenry
detailedReviews.text: I was a lucky winner of a free large cheese pizza . I also ordered some pepperoni rolls while I was there . Thank you Big Guys for making my dinner decision easier üòä

detailedReviews.author: Madison Morris
detailedReviews.text: Chicken salads 2/10 threw most of them away- pictures shown on website are misleading. Iceberg lettuce for $20 will not order from them again.

detailedReviews.author: BlizzardOfWinter
detailedReviews.text: Very nice delivery person!

detailedReviews.author: Mary Vogel
detailedReviews.text: I ordered the 2 XL pizza special to take to a Steelers game party. There were lots of selections of food, but the pizza was gone almost immediately. It was delicious. My order was ready for my scheduled pick-up time and the staff was friendly and efficient.

detailedReviews.author: Dr Carter
detailedReviews.text: Just paid 18 dollars for a deluxe hoagie that they pretty much sprinkled steak onto. Might as well of been just fries on a hoagie. Not cool

detailedReviews.author: Christine Martin
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza ever!!!

detailedReviews.author: Ryan Higgins
detailedReviews.text:
Would leave negative stars if I could‚Ä¶.

I ordered from here yesterday for the first time in a very long time. I always order the family special with a Pittsburgh steak hoagie and various toppings on my pizza.

The hoagie was decent, could have been baked for a couple extra minutes, but it was eatable.

Garlic knots‚Ä¶can‚Äôt really mess them up.

The pizza‚Ä¶.. if I worked there last night and sent this pizza to me I would fire myself. I can only guess that my order was rushed to be able to be delivered with another order‚Ä¶.???? I was told 60-75 minutes, and it showed up in about 25 minutes. I also live 10 minutes from the store.

The pizza may have been cooked for 3, maybe 4 minutes tops. Two of the slices had no toppings of any kind, because of the giant bubble that formed. (It happens, but the pizza looked like crap) The cheese tasted like someone stores it in their underwear and then spreads it on the pizza. I have had many pizzas from many places, and this BY FAR is the grossest pizza I ever had. A shitty pizza, half decent hoagie, 6 garlic knots, and a 2L cost me $50.00‚Ä¶..

That‚Äôs insane. I am an idiot for spending $50 on this, but I was swindled out of $50 for food I wouldn‚Äôt serve to a dog.

Owner‚Ä¶..no I didn‚Äôt call. I was too pissed off and couldn‚Äôt believe you let food leave your store like this. I didn‚Äôt want a remake either. Keep your damn $50 and maybe put it towards improving your product.

Good luck to those that take a chance with this place!

(I have no photos because I ate one slice and threw it away in disappointment)

detailedReviews.author: Debbie Martini
detailedReviews.text: We have always had good food from Big Guys Pizza. They go above and beyond to make sure that everything is that it should be it is definitely our go to pizza place.

detailedReviews.author: Jude Scumaci
detailedReviews.text: Always delicious! Thanks for supplying lunch for Scott Townships Public Works department! Everyone is friendly and the food came out of the oven right on time!

detailedReviews.author: Vishal Chhatwani
detailedReviews.text: Good taste and a variety of options

detailedReviews.author: Dodie Schaub
detailedReviews.text: We ordered a large pizza with pepperoni and half sausage, a small white pizza with spinach, and garlic knots. Our order was delivered a few before the quoted time. Everything was hot and delicious. The garlic knots were soft, not burnt and so good. We will be ordering again!

detailedReviews.author: holly marie
detailedReviews.text: Love the food, love the service!

detailedReviews.author: C. McClellan
detailedReviews.text:
Best pizza that delivers to my house. The sausage they use is thin sliced like gyro meat and the perfect amount of spicy.

Highly recommend Big Guys Pizza!

detailedReviews.author: PITTSBURGH PIZZAGUY
detailedReviews.text: Good food great prices! The pizza was good, definitely high quality ingredients, Great amount of topping, A little too much sauce for me, as it seems to weigh the crust down and saturate the dough. If you're looking for a pizza that has a savory saucy bite.. this one's for you!!  all in all a solid pie.

detailedReviews.author: Tearra Renee
detailedReviews.text: I moved out South Fayette a year ago I‚Äôll give them a 100/10  they was the first I orders from and I was HAPPY üî•ü§óüí™üèæ

detailedReviews.author: Jeff Ruffing
detailedReviews.text: Very professional in customer care. After my order was taken, I sat waiting. I was informed twice as to how much ‚Äúlonger‚Äù it was going to be. Of course , the employees were buzzing around busy as can be. One employee was being trained by another employee. It was amazing to see the patience in that employee to teach any employee as well as resume his busy duties. GREAT TEAM WORK. I had order a large cheese pizza and to me it was very tasty. I‚Äôll get it again.

detailedReviews.author: Rebecca Field
detailedReviews.text: A great white pizza!

detailedReviews.author: Jim Mann
detailedReviews.text: Great food.  My favorite is thin round with mushrooms and pepperoni.  Love the steak hoagie too.  Everyone is alway really nice.

detailedReviews.author: Dimitrije Ibrocic
detailedReviews.text: Excellent service and even better food!

detailedReviews.author: Justin Pena
detailedReviews.text: Big Guys is the shit!

detailedReviews.author: Katie Bovard
detailedReviews.text: ALWAYS the BEST pizza!!

detailedReviews.author: Mary Albanesi
detailedReviews.text: I order from the Bridgeville store online, since the Brentwood store moved.  So many menu choices!  Food is ALWAYS GREAT & delivery is FAST!!!  My new favorite take-out place!!!  LOVE IT!!!  **NOTE TO CRYSTAL NOECKER, WHO POSTED A 1-STAR REVIEW 2 WEEKS AGO.. I COULDN'T GET DELIVRRY, EITHER, AFTER THE BRENTWOOD STORE CLOSED.  HOWEVER, I NOW ORDER ON UBER EATS, WHO DOES DELIVER TO OUR AREA FROM THE BRIDGEVILLE STORE!  PROBLEM SOLVED!**

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers are genuinely thrilled with their experience. With an average 4.5/5 rating across 100 recent reviews, your restaurant consistently exceeds expectations.

strengthsPerceived: Customers consistently praise the delicious taste and fresh quality of Big Guys Pizza's offerings, including their pizza, hoagies, and unique items like lasagna pizza. - social media marketing can showcase this strength

The staff at Big Guys Pizza are frequently described as incredibly friendly and accommodating, often going above and beyond for customers, such as offering complimentary fries and ensuring lost items are returned safely. - review management can highlight this positive aspect

Big Guys Pizza's community involvement and monthly lottery, where customers can win free items like a large cheese pizza, are highly appreciated by patrons. - Boostly marketing services can amplify this
improvementOpportunities: Negative reviews and reputation issues regarding food quality and pricing - review management can address this concern
Misleading menu pricing and lack of staff knowledge - social media marketing can improve this area
Poor online visibility and competition issues - SEO services can solve this visibility issue

positive.text: Big Guys Pizza is DELICIOUS!  I have ordered several times from here and I have never been disappointed. Staff is very friendly! Five stars for me!!!

I am not paying that. I‚Äôll never pay that because he‚Äôs never know what the hell you End were doing over there so I will stop buying from you. I‚Äôll just go somewhere else. recommendations.title: Generate More Reviews
recommendations.description: Encourage satisfied customers to leave reviews
